ROOT:
SELECT * FROM [T_Workflow], [T_CurrentWorkflow]
WHERE [T_Workflow].[WorkflowControlNo] = [T_CurrentWorkflow].[WorkflowControlNo] AND [SubSystemId] = @SubSystemIdIS NULL AND [WorkflowName] = @WorkflowNameIS NULL AND ToUserId IN (@ToUserId) AND ToUserPositionTitlesId_Equal = @ToUserPositionTitlesId_Equal AND ToUserPositionTitlesId_GTOE >= @ToUserPositionTitlesId_GTOE AND AcceptanceDate IS NULL
SubSystemId, String, OEQT
WorkflowName, String, Quote
ToUserId, decimal, 1, 2
ToUserPositionTitlesId_GTOE, Int32, 0
